name: Jungle Fantasy
description:
Jungle Fantasy, a continuous runner game where you will find various items to collect.

This game includes beautiful fantasy jungle graphics.You will encountered various types of enemy including Rockets, Spider, Sticks etc. Escape these enemies while running.
As you go deep, character's speed increases and it will leads to increase difficulty for escaping those enemies.

Each time you play you are going to beat your own previous High Score.

So, what you are waiting for. Download it and lets RUN and Enjoy.

Credits:
1. craftpix.net
2. "Sunsai" of freesound.org
